Frequently Asked Questions

Common questions about our AI US index prediction service
Our AI models are based on deep learning and machine learning technologies. All daily predictions are public, and the current accuracy is about 70%.
While our overall win rate is about 70%, no one knows how certain a specific day will be. However, every month there are a few days when we are much more confident in our predictions. In the financial world, certainty is more precious than gold, because users can use leverage to maximize profits.
Our prediction data is available every US trading day.
We currently mainly support US stock markets (NYSE, NASDAQ) and Bitcoin markets.
Pro users can obtain API access for prediction data, screening results, etc. We provide detailed API documentation and technical support to help you integrate into your own trading systems.
